description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Want to fight? Want some teamwork? You've only got 5 minutes? Try this game! Also contains skills, equipement, boss, random dungeons... Still here? I have a secret for you, you can play more than 5 minutes if you finish several dungeons, but don't tell anyone.
description.short: Want to fight? Want some teamwork? You've only got 5 minutes? Try this game! Also contains skills, equipement, boss, random dungeons... Still here? I have a secret for you, you can play more than 5 minutes if you finish several dungeons, but don't tell anyone.
